title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
Ok so I removed the gpu and i have no chime. I checked the tona resistor r7402 12.55v and it’s 91k. Ppvcore_s0_cpu ph1,2,3
.78-.9v PPVCORE_so_axg_L=.458v 
Cpuimvp_boot1G=4.7v is this right ?

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
Why did you remove the GPU so fast?
Even shorted, disabling GPU for test is very easy on this board.

VCORE looks good now, but you still need to force iGPU.
Did you check USB activity?

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: Someone had previously remove and mount it sideways I just removed it and placed correctly but it was shorted. So I took it off.. Yes blinking mouse and blinking usb stick

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
Blinking USB mouse is no good...
Try this file, just in case...
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-E01-NpQ0hiF-xU6MRyRIgeXAtxKyVzk/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
Ok.
1-What would be the right usb mouse solid light ? I just wanna know for next time.
2- Also after a newer gpu “2017” is swapped and the client wanted the underfill replaced I was gonna use Loctite 3513. Because High temp silicone smells Strong so I’m hoping 3513 is better. Do you have a product Suggestion that is better ?
3-the video memory was also reflowed because there’s flux and the underfill is removed here as well. Will this cause my current issue?

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
As I said, you should try disabling GPU first.
You must get steady light on USB mouse and video with iGPU.
If not, you have another problem on the board.

I will not waste the time changing GPU on these boards.
Explain to the client, impossible to get real new chip; you've probably soldered a refurbished one now.

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: Ok i was wrong it was booting I just had no chime. Weird thing is I just have no chime but the audio does work When it boot into OS X the audio works :/ . I’m not sure why I don’t get a chime I tried PRAM a few time and nothing. all I have left it to resolve no WiFi hardware installed and 1 usb isn’t working :/ thank You In advanced for any help. I’m gonna start at L3401

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: Check the small inductors placed on USB data lines.

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: I forgot to ask. why is it not chiming ? Is it disable in nvram? Wouldn’t a PRAM reset it?

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
PRAM reset should bring chime back.
I remember someone else claimed about this issue last month.
However, chime matters so much?

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: I’m not sure it’s not in me :/ I’m just trying to resolve all issues before it leaves so they have nothing to complain about. I found the usb issue it was d4600 along with 3 vias that I ran jumpers to. All I have left is the chime so if I solve it I will post it here so maybe it can help someone else. :) thanks a lot for your help

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: ok I found something only there 4 caps I found 28ohm short. In diode I get .028v two are tantalum c6622 and c6632. The other two are ceramic. I was thinking that maybe that tantalum as they have a higher failed rate but at 5v I’m not sure which direction to go. At first I thought it was the chip but measurements I have around chip .489v to .520v and the gain test point measures .487 off u6630 but u6620 is cover with underfill so I couldn’t test all leads.  What is your honest opinion? I’m still trying to recover chime :/ oh and oddly audio does still work but only after OS X boots :(

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
If you have sound in macOS, audio amplifiers are good.
Unless you detect missing sound in some speaker.

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message:
I replaced u6620 and got chime I really took my time protecting all the plastic and only burned just the upper corner of the sub connector :) I’m so glad that’s over 
Thank you informatico for all your help

title: 820-2915 shorted gpu
message: So you didn't have sound on right speaker from the beginning?
